# Vectors

```{r}
# numeric vector
a <- c(1, 2, 5, 3, 6, -2, 4)

# character vector
b <- c("one", "two", "three")

# logical vector
c <- c(TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE)

# refering to elements
a[3]
a[c(1, 3, 5)]
a[2:6]

# generating a sequence of numbers
a <- c(2:6)
a
```
